key_responsibilities: manage all aspects of constituent correspondence
work with the scheduler to coordinate Member’s schedule in the Washington office
tracking and assigning mail through constituent management software
preparing letters of greetings, condolence and congratulations on behalf of the Member
light casework assignments (post office problems and requests for expedited passports)
serving as intern coordinator (recruiting, training, scheduling and assigning duties)
requirements: significant experience interacting with the public
working knowledge of the District of Columbia
resident of the District of Columbia or willing to move immediately to D.C.
salary: based on skill and experience level
